name: Zombies (MagicMantis)
description: This is a project I made a while ago when I was just getting started making games. It is a top-down version of the Nazi Zombies from Call of Duty: World at War. I created all the sprites except the fire animation and the gun icons. The music and most of the sound effects were taken from online. I don't own them. Instructions on how to play will be displayed when you launch the game.
